name: ecohunt-production
description: AI-powered environmental conservation platform with blockchain rewards

scripts.build: echo 'Build completed - Frontend deployed via Vercel'
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd deployment && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network baseTestnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd deployment && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network base
scripts.verify:testnet: cd deployment && npx hardhat verify --network baseTestnet
scripts.verify:mainnet: cd deployment && npx hardhat verify --network base
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../deployment && npm install && cd ../ai-verification && npm install
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Please configure your .env file with proper values'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules deployment/node_modules ai-verification/node_modules
scripts.migrate: cd deployment && npx hardhat run scripts/migrate.js

author: EcoHunt Team
